about_the_game:
Each level will have a different maze layout and more creatures trying to find you. Your goal will be to find all the hidden flowers as quickly as possible, before the top hatted, scarred face skeleton of a nightmare, Dr Audrey, catches you.

You'll have an inventory which you'll be able to store imperative items in such as batteries, keys and essentials for the completion of puzzles. Use the scroll wheel (or the RT and LT if you're using a controller!) to select items in your inventory with ease.

short_description: A brief introduction to a fast-paced horror game in a black and white paper world. Sneak, run, hide in a labyrinth of corridors, trying to collect all the flowers before the top hatted, scarred face skeleton of a nightmare catches you. Solve puzzles, find items & trick the monsters.
